name: Deep Sleep
description: Also known as P.O. 4, Deep Sleep is a cross of the Larry OG and Pre-98 Bubba Kush from North Hollywood breeders Progressive Options. This indica-dominant hybrid is quite aptly named, as it quickly reduces users to a puddle of sleepy relaxation. The flavor of Deep Sleep is very sweet and fruity on the inhale with a nice OG funk on the exhale. Fans of OG Kush will love these thick, resinous, purple-tinted flowers.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Tingly, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Anxious
